answers.answer: I believe at the beginning, diabetes can present this way, but I'm not sure if that's what's going on or not.  I know it's hard to wait for results.

He might have a tape worm from eating pork that was not cooked properly or not cooked long enough.The trichenosis can be cured.  He would need to see a doctor about a good anti-parasitic and then take epsom salts to expel the worm.(My mom had this when we lived in Europe).  She lost a lot of weight in very little time.Hope this information was helpful.

I was almost exactly the same with the weight loss and similar symptoms.  When I went to the doctor, he discovered I was diabetic and told me not to let my glucose level get below 60 nor above 135 except after meals.Good luck.
